category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 39-2 (Exclusion and avoidance of members)
contents: Article 39-2 (Exclusion and avoidance of members) ① Committee members under Articles 37 and 38 shall not participate in the deliberation and resolution of the committee in any of the following cases. 1. When the person subject to deliberation is a relative (referring to a relative under Article 777 of the Civil Act) 2. The member himself, his spouse, or a direct ascendant or descendant is an executive or employee of a corporation or organization that performs services related to the work or business that is the subject of deliberation 3. If there is or was an interest in the business or business subject to deliberation, such as serving in a service or advisory role. 4. If there are other significant reasons why the deliberation cannot be conducted fairly. ② Reasons for Paragraph 1 If any of the following applies, the member must voluntarily avoid deliberation on the matter. [This article was newly established on February 11, 2020]
